SCSS

SCSS preprocessor is used for the creation of this website

  • line height trick

    https://medium.com/codyhouse/line-height-crop-a-simple-css-formula-to-remove-top-space-from-your-text-9c3de06d7c6f

  • box sizing reset

    https://css-tricks.com/box-sizing/

  • Prevent animation during window resize

    https://css-tricks.com/stop-animations-during-window-resizing/

  • Responsive Embedded Video

    https://www.ostraining.com/blog/coding/responsive-videos/

  • Link Animation

    https://cssanimation.rocks/animating-links/

  • SCSS Breakpoint Mixin Utility

    https://medium.com/codeartisan/breakpoints-and-media-queries-in-scss-46e8f551e2f2
